Beer is proof that god loves us and wants us to be happy

contents.name: Guinness
contents.description: Dry Irish stout. Served according to brewery’s exact specifications, and poured by the best.

contents.name: Kilkenny
contents.description: Irish cream ale brewed in Ireland. Smooth and distinguished.

contents.name: Stella Artois
contents.description: Belgian style pilsner, full bodied and well balanced. Perfect for everyday moments.

contents.name: Hoegaarden
contents.description: Authentic Belgian wheat/white beer. Naturally cloudy and spiced with coriander and orange peel for a great thirst quenching ale

contents.name: Goose Island – Matilda
contents.description: Golden sunrise color, fruity aroma, spicy yeast flavor.

contents.name: Bells (Seasonal)
contents.description: Kalamazoo brewing, michigan. Please ask server.

contents.name: Labatt Blue
contents.description: Canadian pilsner style lager. Full flavored beer. Well balanced, fruity character, slight sweet aftertaste.

contents.name: Magners Cider
contents.description: Irish classic hard cider, medium sweet. (Sometimes served over ice)

contents.name: Pranquester
contents.description: Belgian style beer, golden ale, full fruity flavor and clean finish

contents.name: Lagunitas IPA
contents.description: India pale ale from california, great hops, smooth malts with a fruity finish

contents.name: Carlsberg
contents.description: Is‎ the quintessential pilsner beer, medium bodied, dry and well proportioned with a characteristic hop bitterness.

contents.name: Sam Adams
contents.description: Boston lager

subsections.subsection_name: Founders Brewing Co. – Grand Rapids, Mi.

contents.name: Founders Red Rye Pa
contents.description: Serious hop bitterness, along with an unyielding grapefruit bouquet from theamarillo dry hops, balances the malty richness of 4 varieties of importedcarmel malts. A generous addition of dry rye malt accentuates a spicy crisp finish.

contents.name: Founders Centennial IPA
contents.description: Relish the citrus accents from the abundance of dry hopping. Sweet yet balanced malty undertones shake hands with the hop character.

contents.name: 90 Minute IPA
contents.description: A big beer with a great malt backbone that stands up to the extreme hopping rate.

contents.name: Raison D’être
contents.description: Deep mahogany ale w/beet sugar, green raisins and belgian yeast. “Complex as a fine red wine”

contents.name: Eliot Ness. An Amber Lager with Rich, Fragrant Malt Flavors, Balanced with Crisp, Noble Hops.
Dortmunder Gold
contents.description: A‎ smooth lager that strikes a delicate balance between sweet malt and dry hop flavors

contents.name: Steam
contents.description: The deep amber color, thick creamy head and rich flavor, combined with well hopped malty character. A true original steam beer.

contents.name: Porter
contents.description: Rich, dark and complex. Special roasted malts, fresh whole hops to produce a rich flavor with subtle notes of chocolate, toffee and coffee.

contents.name: Flywheel
contents.description: German inspired beer. Flywheel bright lager goes great with everything. A mild, bready malt sweetness greets you at the lips, smoothing the crisp hop flavors.

contents.name: Domaine Dupage
contents.description: Amber in color, tasty sweet caramel start, finishes with hops to clean off palate.

contents.name: Brother Thelonious
contents.description: Dark brown belgian style abbey ale. Released in conjunction w/the thelonious monk institute of jazz (brewery contributes to support jazz education)

contents.name: Fat Tire Amber Ale
contents.description: Toasty, biscuit maltiness, pleasantly balanced with crisp hoppiness.

contents.name: Lagunitas Pils
contents.description: Aczech‎ style pilsner, fresh crisp smooth hops, full bodied without the heaviness,

contents.name: Shiner Bock
contents.description: Spoetzls flagship beer. Malty lager beer of german origin. Rich and toasty with hints of caramel. Hops are undetectable.

contents.name: Miller Lite, Miller High Life, Mgd, Bud, Bud Lite, and Coors Lite.
Last but Not Least the Lovely PBR Can!!
Leffe Blonde
contents.description: A‎ dry fruity, lightly spiced beer, full and creamy. Delicate and light malt aroma and subtle sweet finish.

contents.name: La Chouffe
contents.description: Belgian golden ale. Lovely head with a light lemongrass aroma. Peach and nectarine flavors on the tongue.

contents.name: Dubbel
contents.description: Trappist ale. Brown-amber color, deeply malty with a subtle and dry finish that hints at tropical fruit.

contents.name: Trippel
contents.description: Trappist ale. Orange-gold color, herbal aroma and complex flavors that meld rich warm sweetness, hops and powerful drinkability.

contents.name: Delerium Tremens
contents.description: Golden‎ in color, creamy head, fruity aftertaste, big bodied beer

contents.name: Delirium Nocturnum
contents.description: Belgian dark ale, bursting of raisins, bittersweet chocolate and aniseed. Hoppy aftertaste.

contents.name: Duvel
contents.description: Elegant and strong golden ale. Creamy head, champagne sparkle with notes of pear. Dry finish.

contents.name: Atomium Premier Grand Cru
contents.description: 6 Grains. Barley, rye, spelt, corn, wheat and buckwheat. Hazy orange-amber, flavored w/hops, coriander and orange zest.

contents.name: La Fin Du Monde
contents.description: Unibroue brewing co. (canada) a belgium inspired triple fermented blond ale.

contents.name: Maudite
contents.description: Unibroue brewing co. (canada) characterized by a robust maltiness and spiciness that is counterbalanced by the assertive crisp hop finishes.

contents.text: (Germany) 16 oz btl

contents.name: Cadonini
contents.description: Honeysuckle, orange and tangerine aromas, clean crisp bright citrus and tart pear and apple flavors, mouth watering finish

contents.name: Finca La Linda
contents.description: Unoaked chardonnay, fruity and fresh with crisp acidity. Aromas of pear, green apple and white peach

contents.name: Buehler
contents.description: The russian river chardonnay spotlights the floral/lime quality for the fruit aromas. Although creamy and full, the natural acidity of russian river carries it to a long and clean finish.

contents.name: Errazuriz
contents.description: Zesty lime, mineral and refreshing aromas of freshly cut grass burst from this aromatic and invigorating glass of crisp chilean sauv. Blanc

contents.name: De Loach
contents.description: Barrel to barrel, very softly textured cornucopia of wild strawberries, cherries and red raspberries complete this seductive pinot

contents.name: Trumpter
contents.description: Distinctive intense deep red color. Cherry and spicy aromas, balanced on the palate with velvety and elegant flavors.

contents.name: Cabernet Sauvignon
contents.description: Coastline cabernet sauvignon is a concentrated wine with a full body and bold structure. Cassis and crushed red berries, hints of vanilla and sandalwood. Finishes juicy with toasty notes and cocoa powder tannins.

contents.name: Lyeth De Lyeth Cab
contents.description: Bold, rich and full bodied, a copious amount of black cherry, touch vanilla are here along with a long intensely flavored finish

contents.name: Avalon. Napa

name: Maxims the Nancy Goldberg International Center

contents.name: B.L.T.
contents.description: The sub that proves great things come in threes. In this case, those three things happen to be crisp bacon, lettuce & juicy tomato. While there is no scientific way of proving it, this B.L.T might be the most perfect sub in existence.

contents.name: Black Forest Ham
contents.description: Simply delicious. This flavorful sandwich is packed w/ lean Black Forest ham & served on your favorite freshly baked bread, like 9 grain wheat or Italian. All this mouthwatering greatness for less than 6g of fat. Can not beat that

contents.name: Buffalo Chicken
contents.description: Good things are hard to come by. That's why we've brought the Buffalo Chicken back for good! All that cool, creamy ranch, poured over tender glazed buffalo chicken. Get it as a delicious Footlong sub!

contents.name: Chicken & Bacon Ranch Melt
contents.description: Saddle up & try the fresh toasted subway chicken & bacon ranch sandwich. Stuffed w/ melted monterey cheddar cheese, tender all-white meat chicken, crispy bacon, lettuce, tomato, onions & green peppers.

contents.name: Cold Cut Combo
contents.description: Can't decide what kind of meat you want? Get them all. The cold cut combo is stacked w/ turkey-based meats - ham, salami & bologna. It's topped w/ crisp vegetables & served on freshly baked bread. This combo has a little bit of everything.

contents.name: Italian B.M.T.
contents.description: An​ Italian masterpiece w/ Genoa salami, spicy pepperoni, & black forest ham. Add your favorite veggies on your choice of freshly baked bread & get ready to enjoy.

contents.name: Meatball Marinara
contents.description: We take Italian style meatballs, drench them in mangialicious marinara sauce, & then serve ëem on your favorite freshly baked bread w/ your choice of crisp veggies. Buon appetito!

contents.name: Oven Roasted Chicken
contents.description: Oven roasted to perfection & piled high atop freshly baked bread w/ your favorite toppings from spicy jalapenos to crisp green peppers or whatever you like. With all this juicy flavor, your taste buds won't believe it has 6g of fat.

contents.name: Roast Beef
contents.description: This tasty number, w/ less than 6g of fat, is piled high w/ lean roast beef & your choice of fresh veggies, like crisp green peppers & juicy tomatoes. Want to take it up a notch? Try it w/ some spicy jalapenos for a kick in the taste buds.

contents.name: Spicy Italian
contents.description: Go​ ahead, spice up your life. Served on your favorite freshly baked bread & toasted to perfection, the spicy Italian features spicy pepperoni & sensational salami. Try one today w/ everything else your taste buds desire.

contents.name: Steak & Cheese
contents.description: Back by popular demand, the steak & cheese is here to stay. The two most elemental, irresistible ingredients in the world - piled high onto freshly baked bread & your choice of crisp veggies.

contents.name: Subway Club
contents.description: Tender sliced turkey, lean roast beef & tasty Black Forest ham come together w/ your choice of fresh veggies for a low-fat flavor fiesta. Try it today on freshly baked bread & experience all the deliciously for 6 grams of fat

contents.name: Subway Melt
contents.description: Imagine freshly baked bread stuffed w/ tender sliced turkey, ham, crispy bacon, melted cheese, & your choice of tasty vegetables & condiments. Now, stop imagining & get your mouth over to your nearest Subway Restaurant.

contents.name: Sweet Onion Chicken Teriyaki
contents.description: This gourmet specialty is a flavorful blend of tender teriyaki glazed chicken strips & our own fat-free sweet onion sauce. Served hot & toasted on freshly baked bread. A taste so big, you won't believe it has less than 6g of fat

contents.name: The Big Philly Cheesesteak
contents.description: The Big Philly Cheesesteak is every meat lover's dream. With lots of steak smothered in melted cheese, it's easy to see why this classic is the taste that Philly is so proud of.

contents.name: Tuna
contents.description: Our​ tasty tuna sandwich is simply sumptuous. Flaked tuna, mixed w/ mayo, & your choice of fresh vegetables, this local favorite can be built to suit your craving.

contents.name: Turkey Breast
contents.description: Get flavor without the flab when you try this American classic. Dive into tender turkey breast piled sky-high w/ everything from lettuce & tomatoes to banana peppers, maybe even jalapenos if you're feeling spicy.

contents.name: Turkey Breast & Black Forest Ham
contents.description: A sandwich so deliciously hearty, you won't know you're eating low fat. Enjoy the flavor of tender sliced turkey breast & Black Forest ham w/ your favorite veggies from juicy tomatoes to sweet red onions served on your favorite freshly baked bread.

contents.name: Tuscan Chicken Melt
contents.description: All the flavors of tuscany in the palm of your hand. This delicious sub is loaded w/ tender, juicy chicken tossed in zesty herb seasoning, then fresh toasted w/ melty cheese on your choice of bread. It is topped w/ a tasty balsamic vinaigrette. With just 8 grams of fat on a 6in sub, itís healthy & tastes great. Or, try it as a 6.00 Footlong Special.

contents.name: Veggie Delite
contents.description: Crispy, crunchy & classically delicious. The Veggie Delite is tangible proof that a sandwich can be high in flavor without being high in fat. Try a delicious combination of lettuce, tomatoes, green peppers, black olives & onions w/ your choice of fat-free condiments on freshly baked bread.

contents.name: Egg & Cheese
contents.description: A classic for a reason. Our egg & cheese is simply delicious. Enjoy a fluffy egg omelet w/ melted cheese fresh toasted on freshly baked bread. It's unbeatable. Try it w/ egg white on 3" flatbread or English Muffin to make it a fresh fit breakfast sandwich!

contents.name: Chopped Salads
contents.description: We're taking salad to a new level. Now, you can make any 6î sub or double meat sub a chopped salad. Try your favorite as a chopped salad today.

contents.name: Kids - Veggie Delite
contents.description: You​ no longer have to sacrifice nutrition or flavor when you're short on time. Choose a Mini sub (Black Forest Ham, Turkey Breast or Roast Beef) & pair it w/ fresh apple slices. Add a 1% low fat white milk to wash it down & you have a better-for-them meal that kids will love.

contents.name: Apple Slices
contents.description: As delicious as our sandwiches are, they are even better when paired w/ the perfect side & drink. Our sides run from salty to sweet & from fit to indulgent. With such a variety of drinks to choose from, there's truly something for every taste.

contents.description: As​ delicious as our sandwiches are, they are even better when paired w/ the perfect side & drink. Our sides run from salty to sweet & from fit to indulgent. With such a variety of drinks to choose from, there's truly something for every taste.

contents.name: Yogurt Parfait
contents.description: Enjoy the delicious taste of our new yogurt parfait, made w/ sweet, juicy strawberries, crunchy granola & smooth, creamy yogurt. It's the perfect treat for breakfast, lunch or any time of day.

contents.name: Bacon, Egg & Cheese
contents.description: Start your day in a sizzlin' way w/ crispy bacon, egg & melty cheese on fresh toasted Flatbread or whatever you like. It's hard to imagine this trio of tasty ingredients could get even better, but just wait till you try it w/ everything from juicy tomatoes to spicy jalapenos for a full on flavor free-for-all.

contents.name: Black Forest Ham, Egg & Cheese
contents.description: Enjoy savory Black Forest Ham, melted cheese, & egg whites all on a fresh toasted English muffin. Add your choice of toasty veggies for a tasty way to start the day! Try this Breakfast Melt w/ egg white on 3" flatbread to make it a Fresh Fit breakfast sandwich!

contents.name: Breakfast B.M.T. Melt
contents.description: Fluffy egg whites, Black Forest ham, salami & spicy pepperoni come together w/ bubbly melted cheese for a morning masterpiece worthy of the breakfast hall of fame. Try it today on a hot toasted light wheat English muffin w/ all your favorite crisp veggies.

contents.name: Egg & Cheese
contents.description: A classic for a reason. Our egg & cheese is simply delicious. Enjoy a fluffy egg omelet w/ melted cheese fresh toasted on freshly baked bread. It's unbeatable. Try it w/ egg white on 3" flatbread or English Muffin to make it a Fresh Fit breakfast sandwich!

contents.name: Steak, Egg & Cheese
contents.description: No matter what side of the bed you wake up on, you'll love this. Yummy egg w/ tender & delicious steak. All covered in melty cheese on freshly baked bread. Oh, what a beautiful breakfast. Try it w/ egg white on 3" flatbread or English Muffin to make it a Fresh Fit breakfast sandwich!

contents.name: Sunrise Subway Melt
contents.description: Rise​ & shine to a delightfully delicious breakfast of tender turkey, crispy bacon, Black Forest ham & fluffy egg white under a blanket of bubbly melted cheese. Try one today on hot toasted flatbread w/ your choice of tasty veggies.
